name: Wildflower
description:
Wildflower is a short experience created as a tribute to the George Floyd Protests; that even in the face of overwhelming adversity, those who seek justice and peace will overcome in the end.

This was made over a couple of weekends as a way for us to expressed our support for the current protests, and inspire others as well. Thus, we will likely not be updating this barring any huge bugs, but we hope you enjoy anyway! <3

Controls
The game requires only a mouse. F4 to go fullscreen. ESC to close the game.

Credits:
Art:  Sarah "Sana" Freeman
Programming: C. T.
Music: Royalty Free Track provided by http://www.nihilore.com/
Sound: Edited from public domain sounds from http://freesound.org
